documentation.text:
@notice Used to retrieve a full list of documents attached to the smart contract.
@return documentNames bytes32 List of all documents names present in the contract.

@notice Used to retrieve a full list of documents attached to the smart contract.
@return documentNames bytes32 List of all documents names present in the contract.

returns.documentHash: bytes32 The hash (of the contents) of the document.
returns.documentTime: uint256 the timestamp at which the document was last modified.
returns.documentUri: string The URI associated with the document.

removeDocument(bytes32).details: Can only be executed by the owner of the contract.

params._name: Name of the document. It should be unique always

setDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32).details: Can only be executed by the owner of the contract.

params._documentHash: hash (of the contents) of the document.
params._name: Name of the document. It should be unique always
params._uri: Off-chain uri of the document from where it is accessible to investors/advisors to read.

getAllDocuments().notice: Used to retrieve a full list of documents attached to the smart contract.

getDocument(bytes32).notice: Used to return the details of a document with a known name (`bytes32`).

removeDocument(bytes32).notice: Used to remove an existing document from the contract by giving the name of the document.

setDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32).notice: Used to attach a new document to the contract, or update the URI or hash of an existing attached document
